Text.Page:
The argons keep our soldiers and civilian prisoners in the Three Towers.

I've seen what the argons do to prisoners. It's abominable. We must rescue those poor people.

I know {@LinkCreature:77#3001#Nithan} briefed you already. Find the prisoners and get them back to {@Rgn:46015$$Hexheart Chamber}.

We'll have operatives ready to get them to safety.

This isn't some routine errand. Stay sharp and stay alive. We certainly don't want to have to rescue you.
Thank you so much! I just knew I was...I don't want to think about it.

Thanks for getting me out of there.

I thought I was a goner for sure.

You saved them from a fate far worse than death, . That's the kind of difference we try to make every day out here.

Fine work, soldier.
